pkgmetadata.longdescription: Conduct Sensitivity Analysis with Continuous Exposures and Binary Outcomes // Performs sensitivity analysis for the sharp null and attributable effects in matched studies with continuous exposures and binary outcomes as described in Zhang, Small, Heng (2024) arXiv:2401.06909. Two of the functions require installation of the 'Gurobi' optimizer. Please see https://www. gurobi.com/documentation/9.0/refman/ins_the_r_package.html for guidance.
